questions.question: This language featured a turtle with a retractable pen.
This language has been likened to an octopus fashioned by nailing legs to a dog.
This language's earliest builtin functions were named specifically to have varying lengths due to an awful hash function.
Before there was the C language, there was the B language, and before that there was this language.
This language, described as a cross between Forth and Lemmings, was designed to be as hard to compile as possible.
